articles.description: It raises questions over how long a hard lockdown due to end on June 10 should continue in the state's capital, Melbourne.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: 'Bye-bye, Australia': The migrants leaving for good so they can see their families - SBS News
articles.description: The federal government's plan to not reopen international borders until at least mid-2022 has been the last straw for many migrants who say they can't wait any longer to see their loved ones overseas.
articles.content:
Wendy Gutteridge moved to Australia from England in 2015 and never wanted to leave. The 45-year-old worked as a prosecutor for the RSCPA in Victoria and became an Australian citizen last year.
